about_the_game:
Welcome to Rivone! A countryside village full of friendly and hardworking people.  You are here to experience the comfort of nature with peace of mind and try new things. Befriend the locals and be ready to be amazed with their skills in hunting, woodwork, gardening, and a lot more. Also, as you progress, you will uncover the myths and legends, unique characteristic of its people, and the beautiful scenery of the forest in the village. However, Rivone has its unexplainable, enchanting beauty that will lure you into thinking everything is perfect and good, but little did you know that there are forest spirits who are unhappy. Thus, villagers are anxiously in need of help. The question is, will you help them?

Game Features

  • Customization & Decoration - You can customize your game character and decorate your house and farm to your preference.

  • Farming – You can plant and harvest crops, vegetables, flowers and fruit trees and also discover unique ways to make the crops more valuable.

  • Raising animals – You can raise animals and breed them to get new variant with distinct color, don’t forget to feed them and take care of them as they can get sick, they will get old and die too.  Don't forget to protect them as there are wild animals who are on a hunt.

  •  Hunting & taming wild animals – Domestic animals such as dogs and cats are common pets and  help you on a day-to-day life. A good companion for hunting and helps protect your crops from wild animals.  Also, you can catch the wild animals by setting traps, then tame and train them to do the same as domestic animal. With their unique abilities and characteristics, it would be a good asset(upgrade) for your farm.

  • Fishing –  Catch and enjoy  discovering new fish species, as season and weather change, you will get a variety of them. Catch big ones that will surprise everyone! Who knows? You might catch an enchanted fish!

  • Bug catching – Explore the forest, then catch and sell different species of bugs . Some will surely give you a high price at the market.

  • Gathering resources & mining – You can gather different kinds of resources from different biomes. Caves and mountains where you can mine gold, ore, crystals  and materials.

  • Fighting monsters – Venture into dark caves and deep forests, it is filled with lurking monsters. Be brave and defeat them! Once defeated, you'll get rare treasures and unique rewards.

  • Community –  participate in different kinds of local sports events, you can also experience different festivals. This is a very close-knit village; people work together to solve certain problems. Villagers here love to eat and cook delicious dishes. You can cook a dish for any villager, if they love it  you will get help at the farm, like harvesting and they will give you tools for hunting.

  • Love & marriage – You can experience the uniqueness of courting and marriage. However, don't forget to have good hygiene, not taking care of yourself, and you'll risk the potential of having a partner. Surely, they will lose interest, leaving you alone. It’s good for your health and building a family. You can have kids!  They will grow and, over time, will turn into adult.

  • Adventure & exploration – Go on a special crafted quest!  Ventures and explore into the depth of the forest or neighborhoods , you'll discover secret passages, rewards, new people, and magical places too!

short_description: Discover the enjoyment as you manage the village and its surrounding forest. You can farm, decorate, hunt, tame wild animals and even find romance with enchanting beings! Also, there are mysteries, challenging task and a unique storyline like no other, a world of endless possibilities awaits you!
